sentences.english: An exception specifier can omit the parameter name when a catch needs to know only the type of the exception in order to handle it.
sentences.chinese: 说明符的类型决定了处理代码能够捕获的异常种类。

sentences.english: They call vividly this plate - type tool it the capture board .
sentences.chinese: 他们将这个板状工具形象地称之为“捕获板”。

sentences.english: The Japanese had captured 440 minke whales.
sentences.chinese: 日本人曾经捕获过440条小须鲸。

sentences.english: The lock release occurs even if the return was caused by an uncaught exception.
sentences.chinese: 即使是未捕获的异常造成了返回，也会发生锁的释放。

sentences.english: This is because the palladium nanoparticles continued to release trapped electrons.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为钯纳米颗粒在不断地释放捕获的电子。

sentences.english: Bycatch was not confined to drift-netting.
sentences.chinese: 副捕获物不仅限于漂网捕鱼。

sentences.english: Uncaught exception thrown by method called through Reflection.
sentences.chinese: 未捕获异常的方法称为通过反射扔。

sentences.english: In 1717 he captured a large French merchantman ship. He made this a powerful ship by putting forty guns on her and named her the "Queen Anne's Revenge".
sentences.chinese: 1717年，他捕获了一艘大型的法兰西商船。

sentences.english: Ms. Roman says she still remembers the first images that it captured.
sentences.chinese: 罗曼女士表示，她至今仍记得哈勃捕获的第一张图像。

sentences.english: Animals use their claws or talons to catch prey, climb trees, and defend themselves.
sentences.chinese: 动物使用爪子来捕获猎物，攀爬树木和自我防御。

sentences.english: Different strides of different personalities captured in full-body shots while strolling in Orchard Road.
sentences.chinese: 不同性格不同的进展捕获全身镜头，而在乌节路散步。

sentences.english: The data architecture area is intended to capture the structure of persistent databases.
sentences.chinese: 数据体系结构区域用于捕获持久型数据库的结构。

sentences.english: This supercontinent will have a small ocean basin trapped at its center.
sentences.chinese: 该超大陆将捕获一个小洋盆居于其中心。

sentences.english: Even so, any skunk captured in Illinois is euthanized.
sentences.chinese: 即使这样，伊利诺伊州内捕获的臭鼬均实施安乐死。

sentences.english: Capturing text of interest just scratches the surface.
sentences.chinese: 捕获感兴趣的文本仅仅是隔靴搔痒。

definition: to hunt and kill (an animal or fish)
to lure into a trap/to trap/to capture
to prey on/to catch and feed on/to hunt for food
to follow a trail/to trace/to pursue
to fish by casting a net/to capture/to surround and seize
to fish for (aquatic animals and plants)/to catch
